sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_acct_consumer.CSQueryExtensionInstanceAccountConsumerOOB</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point global.CSQueryExtensionPoint
Designed for CSM Role configuration. Being called in CSQueryBRUtil to get all the role constants, including OOB role constants and user self customized role constants, to further process the access of these roles.</description>
        <name>CSQueryExtensionInstanceAccountConsumerOOB</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSQueryExtensionInstanceAccountConsumerOOB = Class.create();
CSQueryExtensionInstanceAccountConsumerOOB.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    getRolePermissionPool : function(){
		
		return CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants.ROLE_PERMISSIONS_POOL;
	},
	
	getRoleConditionPool : function(){
		
		return CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants.ROLE_CONDITIONS_POOL;
	},

    type: 'CSQueryExtensionInstanceAccountConsumerOOB'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-18 11:17:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1cbb021ca80ba010f877c69204079b6f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CSQueryExtensionInstanceAccountConsumerOOB</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Data Models for B2B2C" source="sn_acct_consumer">cdd5b05565a6a410f87774d7193784cd</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Customer Data Models for B2B2C">cdd5b05565a6a410f87774d7193784cd</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1cbb021ca80ba010f877c69204079b6f</sys_update_name>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
